resources.string: Note: Standard Scoring and PPR Scoring Formats are based on those used at Pro-Football-Reference.Com
For the period from 2000 through 2017, which of these quarterbacks does NOT have a Top 10 score for the most fantasy points in a single regular season game (standard scoring; check all that apply)?
Which of these quarterbacks has scored the most fantasy points in one regular season (standard scoring)?
Who is the Denver running back who scored 5 rushing touchdowns on his way to the most fantasy points ever scored in a single game in standard scoring?
Which player holds the record for the most fantansy points scored in a single season (both standard and PPR scoring)?
